org.miktim.websocket

Class WebSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.miktim.websocket.WebSocket

  • public class WebSocket
extends Object
    WebSocket client connections and WebSocket servers factory.

        Parameters:

        password - password

      • closeAll

        public void closeAll(String reason)
        Closes all servers/connections within this WebSocket instance with specified reason.

        Connections close status code 1001 (GOING_AWAY).

        Parameters:
        reason - connection close reason. Max reason length 123 BYTES.
        See Also:
        WsStatus, WsConnection.close(int,String)

      • closeAll

        public void closeAll()
        Closes all servers/connections within this WebSocket instance.

        Connections close status code 1001 (GOING_AWAY).

        See Also:
        WsStatus, WsConnection.close(int,String)

      • startSecureServer

        public WsServer startSecureServer(int port,
                                  WsConnection.Handler handler,
                                  WsParameters wsp)
        Creates and starts WebSocket server for TLS connections.
        Parameters:
        port - listening port number.
        handler - server side connection handler.
        If you need to handle server events, use WsServer.Handler wich extends WsConnection.Handler.
        wsp - server side connection parameters.
        Returns:
        WebSocket TLS server instance.
        Throws:
        WsError - on server creation error
        Causes: IOException, GeneralSecurityException, NullPointerException
        Since:
        4.3
        See Also:
        setKeyStore(String, String), setKeyFile(File, String)

      • startSecureServer

        public WsServer startSecureServer(int port,
                                  WsConnection.Handler handler)
        Creates and starts WebSocket server for TLS connections with default connection parameters
        See startSecureServer(int, WsConnection.Handler, WsParameters) for details
        Throws:
        WsError - on server creation error
        Since:
        4.3

      • startServer

        public WsServer startServer(int port,
                            WsConnection.Handler handler,
                            WsParameters wsp)
        Creates and starts WebSocket server for insecure connections
        Parameters:
        port - listening port number.
        handler - server side connection handler.
        If you need to handle server events, use WsServer.Handler wich extends WsConnection.Handler.
        wsp - server side connection parameters.
        Returns:
        WebSocket cleartext server instance.
        Throws:
        WsError - on server creation error
        Causes: IOException, GeneralSecurityException, NullPointerException
        Since:
        4.3

      • startServer

        public WsServer startServer(int port,
                            WsConnection.Handler handler)
        Creates and starts WebSocket server for insecure connections with default connection parameters
        See startServer(int, WsConnection.Handler, WsParameters) for details
        Returns:
        WebSocket cleartext server instance.
        Throws:
        WsError - on server creation error
        Since:
        4.3

      • connect

        public WsConnection connect(String uri,
                            WsConnection.Handler handler,
                            WsParameters wsp)
        Creates and starts WebSocket client connection.
        Parameters:
        uri - connection uri string like:
        scheme://[user-info@]host[:port][/path][?query][#fragment]
        - scheme (ws: | wss:) and host are required;
        - :port (80 | 443), /path and ?query are optional;
        - user-info@ and #fragment are ignored.
        handler - client side connection handler.
        wsp - client side connection parameters.
        Returns:
        WebSocket connection instance.
        Throws:
        WsError - on connection creation error.
        Causes: URISyntaxException, IOException, GeneralSecurityException, NullPointerException
        See Also:
        setTrustStore(String, String), setKeyFile(File, String)

      • connect

        public WsConnection connect(String uri,
                            WsConnection.Handler handler)
        Creates and starts WebSocket client connection with default parameters
        See: connect(String, WsConnection.Handler, WsParameters) for details
        Returns:
        WebSocket connection instance.
        Throws:
        WsError - on connection creation error
        Since:
        5.0
